Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': The Lurker Scout ship was one of the more common scout transports during the days of the Old Republic. Though it is light on weaponry, like most scout ships, it features an impressive sensor array, housed in the dome on the dorsal portion of the craft. In addition to the standard living equipment for the crew, the ship also carries several probe droids which are typically deployed onto unknown worlds to bring back preliminary data on the planet. The on board computer features a large database of explored planets and systems, and has the option to transmit newly mapped information back to a central computer so that multiple scout ships can create comprehensive maps without redundant mapping expeditions.
